title: New experiments physico-mechanicall, touching the spring of the air, and its effects (made, for the most part, in a new pneumatical engine) : written by way of letter to the Right Honorable Charles, Lord Vicount of Dungarvan, eldest son to the Earl of Corke / by the Honorable Robert Boyle, Esq.
author: Boyle, Robert, 1627-1691.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by H. Hall ... for Tho. Robinson,
